微透析如何有利于药物开发在本次采访中，了解 Charles River 如何利用微透析的力量进行药物开发以及中枢神经系统治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/How-can-microdiaanalysis-benefit-drug-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/How-can-microdialysis-benefit-drug-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=94dfd534-b7c0-4519-909b-81c484e06098 Tue, 03 Sep 2024 11:26:00 -0400 How can microdialysis benefit drug development

新方案探索多发性硬化症患者有氧运动和认知康复的结合凯斯勒基金会的研究人员发布了一项新的临床方案，研究有氧运动和认知康复相结合，以改善行动不便的多发性硬化症 (MS) 患者的学习和记忆能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/New-protocol-explores-the-combination-of-aerobic-exercise-and-cognitive-rehabilitation-for-MS-患者.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/New-protocol-explores-the-combination-of-aerobic-exercise-and-cognitive-rehabilitation-for-MS-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a82b90df-b12b-4cfe-b011-12f2e7410681 Tue, 03 Sep 2024 11:15:16 -0400 New protocol explores the combination of aerobic exercise and cognitive rehabilitation for MS patients

研究表明产前接触大麻会导致注意力缺陷多动症（ADHD）风险略有增加一项新研究揭示了产前接触大麻的神经精神风险的微妙发现。研究发现，后代患注意力缺陷多动症的风险略有增加，并且更容易吸食大麻。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Study-reveals-slight-increase-in-ADHD-risk-from-prenatal-cannabis-exposure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Study-reveals-slight-increase-in-ADHD-risk-from-prenatal-cannabis-exposure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c180111-7c16-44cf-8f91-0d7aea03676b Tue, 03 Sep 2024 09:09:00 -0400 Study reveals slight increase in ADHD risk from prenatal cannabis exposure
